upload-zone.label: Drop files or folders here to upload

new-project-dialog.title: New Project
new-project-dialog.error-not-valid-name: Only letters and numbers are allowed
new-project-dialog.error-not-available: Name is not available. Please try another one.
new-project-dialog.error-dns: It seems you haven't configured dns settings for the domain name. You can view dns settings by clicking the button below. If you configured please keep in mind it may take some time for the dns to take effect across the internet.

upload-queue-dialog.conflict-question: Do you want to overwrite it?

project-settings-dialog.delete-message: !! WARNING !! this action is irreversible! Are you sure?

contact-dialog.title: You can reach us on these channels

dns-info-dialog.title: Dns settings for custom domains
dns-info-dialog.line1: First, go to the DNS settings page of your domain provider.
dns-info-dialog.line2: Then, Create an A record: type @ for "Host" and paste 178.128.141.114 under "Value" or "Points to".
dns-info-dialog.line3: If you want to redirect www subdomain add CNAME record like above.
dns-info-dialog.line4: Please keep in mind, depending on your dns provider it may take some time to activate new settings.
